description:
First of all, I'm sorry for the shortness of the song clips. We were pummelled by Copyright restrictions on the track in a way we've never seen - so it really limited what we could show. 
Please watch the video and listen to the whole track here:
https://youtu.be/fSHoePrnmMw?si=dTl_1PqRZVAamdnK
I confess I am no expert on Linkin Park's catalogue and I'm not sure what I was expecting, but it wasn't this.

'Dreams on Toast' - the new Darkness album - is released in March - and we'll be going on tour:  
https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/
https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/officialstore 
Our single, The Longest Kiss is here:  https://thedarkness.lnk.to/tlk 

To go behind the scenes with me or to join a monthly Zoom Call Night, head over to my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

Justin Hawkins Rides Again...The Podcast. You can listen to the archives on Apple Podcast, Spotify etc: https://open.spotify.com/show/0h
title: Linkin Park: Unexpected.
